page.title: 03HOUSING & VILLAGE LIFE
page.content:
The central part of the village is quite old with evidence that it was a village in the original Domesday Book of 1086. Until the middle of this century it must have remained a fairly small village,with other small settlements around it such as:_ Bovingdon on Green Pudds Cross Shantock Hall Venus Hill Hogpits Bottom Bulstrode
One new housing estate was built in the 1930s and two further estates in the last ten years. Many of the people who live here travel outside the village for work.
